import React, { useContext } from "react"; import Nav from "../Component/Nav"; import Sidebar from "../Component/Sidebar"; import Footer from "../Component/Footer"; import { toast, ToastContainer } from "react-toastify"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet-async"; import { Store } from "../../Store"; import profile from "../../img/login.png"; import axios from "../../axios"; export const Profile = () => { const { state } = useContext(Store); const { user } = state; const [name, setName] = useState(user ? user.name : ""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(user ? user.email : ""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = async () =>{ if(!name || !password || !email){ toast.success('All form fields are required') return; } try { await axios.put("/users/profile", { name, email, password, },); } catch (error) { console.log(error.message) toast.success(error.message) } } return (
profile

); };
